name: lPmL
title: 三角形領域に文字いれるやつ
description:
• BonsaiJS の練習
  • CSS Exclusions の練習
  • 丸はドラッグ可能
  • CSS Exclusions は Chrome（25 くらい？）でかつ chrome://flags で「試験運用版の WebKit 機能を有効にする」必要がある

js.content:
code = ->
  points = [50, 50, 200, 400, 400, 200]

  shapeInside = (new Path)
    .attr('strokeWidth', 3)
    .stroke('black')
    .fill('rgba(100, 150, 255, 0.2)')
    .addTo(stage)

  updatePoints = ->
    shapeInside.points(points).closePath()
    stage.sendMessage('update', points)
  updatePoints()

  [fx, fy] = 0
  for x, i in points by 2
    y = points[i + 1]
    do (i=i) ->
      (new Circle x, y, 10)
        .attr('strokeWidth', 3)
        .stroke('rgb(150, 30, 30)')
        .fill('rgba(150, 30, 30, 0.2)')
        .addTo(stage)
        # events
        .on('multi:pointerdown', (e) ->
          [fx, fy] = [@attr('x'), @attr('y')]
        )
        .on('multi:drag', (e) ->
          @attr {
            x: points[i]     = fx + e.diffX
            y: points[i + 1] = fy + e.diffY
          }
          updatePoints()
        )
        .emit('multi:pointerdown')


$ = (id) -> document.getElementById id

main = ->
  text = $('textfield')
  com = bonsai.run $('field'), {
    width: innerWidth, height: innerHeight, code
  }
  com.on 'load', ->
    com.on 'message:update', (p) ->
      text.style.WebkitShapeInside = "polygon(" +
        ("#{x}px #{p[i+1]}px" for x, i in p by 2).join(',') +
        ")"

main()
